title: Who's in charge of the Youtube/OPL Vod uploads?
body:
Whomever they are, they're doing a garbage job.... You tube is horribly organized, vods are never uploaded in a time consistent with other regions either on the Watch.oce or you tube..... why is this so?

Get someone new. That is all.

replies.body: less than an hour before this weeks games start.... last weeks vods still missing. Every other region well inside 24 hours to upload. Get your act together.
watch hon pro replays if u want to learn how to get good at moba. league pros are bad, the worst out of all moba titles
